definition: "Leute" refers to a plural noun commonly used to describe individuals or people. It is frequently employed to refer to a group of individuals, often in a casual or informal context.

examples.german: Viele Leute waren bei der Party.
examples.english: Many people were at the party.

examples.german: Die Leute in diesem Dorf sind sehr freundlich.
examples.english: The people in this village are very friendly.

examples.german: Die Leute haben viel über das Ereignis gesprochen.
examples.english: People talked a lot about the event.

examples.german: Die Leute sind mit der Entscheidung nicht zufrieden.
examples.english: The people are not satisfied with the decision.

examples.german: Die Leute haben viel Spaß auf der Veranstaltung.
examples.english: People had a lot of fun at the event.
